name: The Last Seer of Truth
description:
what started as a project for 2019 coummunity gamejam (in which it hasnt been submitted in) finished as a bit larger game, the game jam theme was "The game is a liar"

So go follow the adventures of this little fella with no combat skills... whatever,  i am not good at describing so you will have to find out by yourself what the game is about
